about_the_game:
Legacy of the Druids is the first quest expansion for Runeflame - an adventure game set in a vibrant fantasy world. As you journey through this fell swamp and uncover terrible ancient secrets, you may stumble across other lost souls in need – do you dare to help?

The Legacy of the Druids expansion includes:

  • New zone
  • New NPCs
  • New quests
  • New puzzles
  • New music

To reach the new zone, follow the north arrow on your compass through the swamps and by the lake. The bright foliage should guide the rest of your way.

(Legacy of the Druids requires completion of the base game content to access.)
